A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 27952

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Records of the State Archivist of the Library of Virginia, 1930-1990

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Records of the State Archivist of the Library of Virginia, 1930-1990. Accession 27952, State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 52180 transferred from the Office of the State Archivist on March 14, 1973.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series:

list.item: Series I. William Barrow Restoration Lab records, 2014-2017;

did.unittitle: William Barrow Restoration Lab records, X-X.

scopecontent.p: Includes: Budget materials, 1943-1979; Correspondence, 1934-1977; Restoration Procedures, 1939-1972, in numerical/chronological order, which document procedures performed by the restoration lab and Restoration Projects, 1970-1977, which include procedure forms grouped by locality.

did.unittitle: Restoration Projects: State, Local and Personal, 1970-1977.

scopecontent.p: Includes: Records related to internal operations.

did.unittitle: Correspondence - Letters of recommendation and resignation, 1942-1966.
Expenses and equipment - Binding (Epps and Snider), 1961-1966.
Expenses and equipment - Catalogs and price lists, undated.
Expenses and equipment - Equipment and furniture, 1960-1968.
Expenses and equipment - Folders and binders, 1959-1968.

scopecontent.p: Includes: Records related to internal operations.

did.unittitle: Photographic Laboratory - Budget and operation costs, 1964-1970.
Photographic Laboratory - Equipment - Microfilm camera and reader, 1951-1968.
Photographic Laboratory - Equipment - Microfilm file cabinets, 1948-1963.
Photographic Laboratory - Microfilm - Given to Mr. Barrow for tests, 1958.
Photographic Laboratory - Microfilm - Newspaper microfilming project, 1949-1957.
Photographic Laboratory - Microfilm - Record of film, 1942-1954.
Photographic Laboratory - Microfilm - Remington Rand, undated.
Photographic Laboratory - Microfilm - Union List of Microfilm, 1953-1955.
Policies and procedures - Microfilm and photocopying, 1940-1969.
American Antiquarian Society - Early American Imprints Project, 1957.
Architectural Drawing in Virginia since 1819 - Exhibit at UVA and Virginia Museum, 1969.
Association of Southeaster Research Libraries, undated.
Church Records - Episcopal - Diocese of Southern Virginia (microfilming project), 1961.
Church Records - Episcopal - Diocese of Southwestern Virginia (Cocke), 19.
Church Records - Episcopal - William H. Seiler, 1959.
Correspondence of William J. Van Schreeven (Special topics), 1939-1960.
Correspondence of William J. Van Schreeven (Special topics), 1947, 1966-1969.
Correspondence of William J. Van Schreeven (Special topics), 1947-1968.
Correspondence of William J. Van Schreeven - Archives Manual, 1953-1959.
Filing Arrangement of the Archives Division, Virginia State Library, 1948.
Relation of Local Historical Societies to the Field of Research, 1956.
Review of Essay on the Government of the English Plantations, 1946.
Review of The History and Present State of Virginia, 1947.
